author: Minyvonne Burke
title: Missouri man arrested for licking items at Walmart to mock coronavirus fears
description: Cody Lee Pfister, 26, posted a video on social media of himself licking deodorants at a Warrenton Walmart. He's been charged with terrorist threats.
content:
Cody Pfister.Warren Police
A 26-year-old Missouri man seen in a social media video licking items at a Walmart to mock fears of the coronavirus pandemic was arrested and charged with terrorist threats.
